cyclone.name: ARLENE
cyclone.current_location: about 240 miles W of Ft. Myers, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: continuing south-southeastward farther into the east-central Gulf of Mexico and forecast to degenerate into a remnant low; no approach toward the northern Gulf Coast is anticipated

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Central and southern Florida Peninsula expected to receive rain; no direct impact expected along Alabama coast

weather_observation.rainfall: Isolated light showers possible, but heavy tropical rainfall not expected
